\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 66722}

\subsection*{Falling from Reality}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Drop5}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 1 cig. & smoked & Cannabis & \\
\hline
 T+ 0:00 &   & smoked & Pharms - Promethazine & \\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 135.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
It started pretty good with me and my friends hearing about a new substance to put in a blunt when we rolled it to make us trip out. 



Thats not how it worked. We ended up coating a swisher with it and rolling it up. After that everything backfired. We smoked it and immediately began feeling more depressed than I've ever been in my life. I tripped and fell flat on my face and passed out. I layed in the same position until the next morning. I've learned since to never try anything new until I see someone do it first, its not the best plan but its better than wasting your life in the driveway.

\end{document}
